lines.dialogue: See, that wasn't so hard was it.
lines.instruction: Press enter to mildly aknowledge ease.

lines.dialogue: Now, I'm going to be honest with you. A slip up this early dosn't bode well for you; you're going to have to be perfect from now on. Immaculate.
I'm taking a risk with you so please, play nice. A lot of the other operators would have shut you down already for what you do but... I'm nice; and more importantly in this case, lazy.
Anyway, let's get back on track.
lines.instruction: Press enter to steel yourself for future challenges.
